job_tasks.phrase: work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates direct collaboration with business stakeholders to understand their needs and objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: Although not explicitly stated, the phrase 'bring AI solutions from idea to production' and 'drive the adoption of (Gen)AI across the bank' implies alignment with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: The description mentions working with 'business experts' and 'client units' to develop AI solutions, suggesting the translation of business needs.
This is a broad statement encompassing the creation and implementation of AI models.
Directly points to the use and development of generative AI technologies.
These are core activities in the modeling phase of AI development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and implement new AI technologies (like chatGPT), algorithms and methods
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions experimenting with and implementing AI algorithms and technologies.
While also related to software development, the focus on 'scalable products' implies building robust AI solutions.
This indicates involvement in the AI modeling aspect as part of a broader solution.

job_tasks.phrase: developing a portfolio of use cases that range from improving customer contact (e.g. voicebot)
job_tasks.justification: Voicebots are a direct application of generative AI and speech technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: revolutionizing the way how we interact with documents by leveraging GenAI
job_tasks.justification: This clearly points to generative AI applications for document interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: bring AI solutions from idea to production
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the entire lifecycle, including the software development necessary for production.
Focuses on building production-ready software that can handle growth.
These are core components of software development for applications.

job_tasks.phrase: transform AI concepts into business-ready solutions
job_tasks.justification: Implies the software engineering effort to make AI concepts functional in a business context.

job_tasks.phrase: building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems
job_tasks.justification: Although not explicitly in the JD, this is a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer as per the coding book's definition, and the JD's emphasis on production and business-ready solutions aligns with this.

job_tasks.phrase: bring AI solutions from idea to production
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'to production' inherently involves operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI systems.
Scalability is a key aspect of production deployment and operations.

soft_skills.phrase: work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts
Experiment and implement new AI technologies
reach out beyond your normal responsibilities

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Generative AI (GenAI), specifically mentioning 'leveraging GenAI' and experimenting with 'chatGPT'. It also highlights building applications that range from voicebots to document interaction tools, all powered by GenAI, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
